title: Election 2012 exit polls : percentage of votes by income
summary: Overall Barack Obama, and Mitt Romney are roughly constant,  throughout the Year
The order of lines according to average values of SOME LABEL, in descending order is: 1. Mitt Romney, and lastly, 2. Barack Obama.
The difference of SOME LABEL between Barack Obama and Mitt Romney is smaller at Year 50000_or_more compared to the Year 100000_or_more.
